Title: City University, School of Informatics
Body: Date: Tue, 26 Nov 1996 23:05:48 GMT Server: Apache/1.1.1 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 5514 Last-modified: Mon, 16 Sep 1996 14:21:10 GMT City University, School of Informatics School of Informatics, City University, London, UK The School of Informatics , City University was formed in August 1990 and brings together related deparments.
